tasks.name: Onboarding & Setup
tasks.description: Complete initial setup and get familiar with the tools and processes.

tasks.name: Setup Development Environment
tasks.description: Install all necessary software and configure your IDE for development work.

tasks.name: Install Node.js & Git
tasks.description: Make sure you have the latest LTS version of Node.js and Git installed and configured.

tasks.name: Configure IDE
tasks.description: Set up your preferred IDE with necessary extensions and configurations.

tasks.name: First Project Contribution
tasks.description: Make your first contribution to a live project and understand the development workflow.

tasks.name: Code Review Process
tasks.description: Learn and participate in the code review process.

tasks.name: Advanced Development Skills
tasks.description: Develop advanced programming and system design skills.

tasks.name: System Architecture
tasks.description: Learn system design principles and architecture patterns.

tasks.name: Leadership & Management
tasks.description: Develop leadership skills and team management capabilities.

tasks.name: Team Building
tasks.description: Learn effective team building and collaboration strategies.
